thread.title: Kanye West to Launch His Own Makeup Line, Donda
thread.title_full: Kanye West to Launch His Own Makeup Line, Donda

title: Kanye West to Launch His Own Makeup Line, Donda
text: Kanye West Is Launching a Beauty Brand—Here’s What We Know February 23, 2017 5:58 PM by Sophie Schulte-Hillen Photo: Getty Images Filed under rumors too good to ignore: Today, murmurs began swirling that Kanye West is expanding his creative focus from basking in the glory of his redemptive Yeezy collection to launching his own makeup line. The rapper turned designer reportedly filed the paperwork for his upcoming beauty brand, Donda, in tribute to his late mother. Out of left field as it sounds for a man who has never so much as smudged on guy-liner, the move is less surprising when considering that West has recently discovered the power of the headline-grabbing makeover, first bleaching his shorn curls platinum in December, then paying resident hair graffiti artist , Daniel Moon, a visit for a neon rainbow hair color refresh. It’s anyone’s guess what West’s fledgeling beauty empire might entail—Kardashian-inspired contouring kits? Manic Panic’s new rival? L’Eau d’Yeezy?—but knowing West, the launch will be a spectacle to look forward to. Your move, RiRi . In This Story: Kanye West Recommended For You
